topic.title: Help: Optional user data
topic.body:
Hi zeronet, I know it is possible to set files to be optional, so they are only downloaded when requested. But is it possible to set files uploaded by users as optional?

Let's say I would like to make a video sharing site, and when I upload a video to the site, it would be added to `data/users/[user-id]/movie1.mp4`. How can I make all user uploaded .mp4 files, optional?

1511696027_1JMUMmZ4qJDGEKyyByhNvMjCFYakD.body:
> [nofish](#comment_1061_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): You have to modify user's content.json file and add "optional": "(.*mp4)" to it.Example from ZeroUp: https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroUp/blob/master/js/Selector.coffee#L15

Thank you for the answer
